long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powerful AI apps you can customize & run at scale: write SQL, perform NLP, draft personalized content, and much more, all from your Chrome browser.

AirOps Apps are configurable, task-specific AI apps with superpowers:

#1: Text Analysis/NLP Apps:

Rapidly configure NLP apps for text classification, sentiment analysis, and entity extraction, at scale, without training data or technical knowhow.

1. Classify large volumes of financial transactions directly in Snowflake
2. Analyze feature-specific product feedback from NPS surveys to improve retention
3. Extract item-level customer sentiment from support tickets

#2: Text Generation Apps:

Generate personalized content with context from your database, the web, or any API.

1. Turn any file type (video, audio, text) into rich summaries or net new assets like landing pages, emails, or blog posts
2. Draft personalized sales or marketing emails based on Linkedin Profiles
3. Leverage your company knowledge base to draft support comms

#3: Data Apps:

Work with SQL 10x faster - now powered by GPT-4: 

1. Draft, fix, and explain SQL from natural language
2. Find, explain, and fix errors in SQL queries
3. Improve the performance of any SQL query for faster queries and lower compute costs
